column5: Went out ice fishing today with Uncle Buck. we got into quite a few fish thanks to his equipment..  Lots of people, but im used to worse on the rivers  We caught atleate 100 fish each, though i didnt really keep count.. Lots of small ones but heres the keepers.  Some close ups   And the biggest of the day   All my fish were caught on a small jig and a berkley power bait minnow. I used a float because i was no good at feeling the light strikes. Only problem is it was a fixed float, boy did people think i was crazy when i started running away from my hole everytime i hooked up. lol  Uncle Buck used minnows and a Jig and both seemed to produce equally well.

Well, I'd say you did pretty good today, especially for your first time!  Guess it helps hooking up with a pro like Goran though, eh?  Congratz on the perch and you'll enjoy ice fishing even more once you fry yourself up some of that perch.  Thanks for that post.
Good show.  Thanks for the report.
Nice work boys, very nice work!!!  Rob C
WTG Boys, got your self a good little feast there.
Looks like some one is going to have a nice perch dinner.
Looks like a great day on the ice to me.  Nice job.
If Goran was on the ice, it must be quite thick.  Glad the fish co-operated for you.  Thanks for the report and pics bud.
Wow, nice catch. good size too. I'm impressed!
Wow, you guys did very well.  Nice to see.  Great report.  Joey
Now that you're hooked the winter will pass much faster for you  .  Glad you had a good first time out, and that the season has finally arrived.  Maureen
Nice looking fish. Thanks for the report.
WOW!!! Now those look like all 10" perchies!!!!     To me, them are jumbos!!!! 10" plus!!! Nice haul!!!
Niiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiice!!!  Thanks for the report!  Gerritt.
Yaa,." Baby...'  that's what it's all about ..... good pic's..  some healthy pearch there.."
